description:
The current ShellCommands class simply drops the user into the requested python interpreter. Appropriate nova context objects should be created and inserted into the interpreter's local state.

I would be happy to provide a patch if someone can point me at the appropriate context objects to generate.
title: nova-manage shell loads no nova context
